data.eml:eml: Revision and phylogenetic analysis of Chilicola sensu stricto (Hymenoptera: Colletidae) with the description of a new species

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Gibbs, Jason, Packer, Laurence (2006): Revision and phylogenetic analysis of Chilicola sensu stricto (Hymenoptera: Colletidae) with the description of a new species. Zootaxa 1355: 1-37, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.174590
